creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text: Issue seems to be limited to FOP 0.94. I ran the supplied file through the Trunk without problems. I'll keep it open for the moment, but should be fixed in the upcoming 0.95 release.
Yes, the problem seems to be gone in 0.95beta.
creator: julian.reschke@gmx.de
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
